channel.title: IATI and blockchain technology
channel.description: This is a topic area to discuss possible synergies between IATI data infrastructure and blockchain technologies.

item.title: IATI and blockchain technology
item.dc:creator: BrentPhillips
item.description:
In case anyone’s interested, I’m helping a nonprofit building a new crowdfunding platform collecting micro-donations for aid organizations involved in crisis response (OneRelief) experiment with using a blockchain ledger behind the scenes to communicate with organizations via exchanging simulated IATI data.

Read full topic

item.title: IATI and blockchain technology
item.dc:creator: dalepotter
item.description:
All interesting stuff, and great to have a shared place to discuss this emerging technology. Particularly good to read James Smith’s blog on the implications and immutability issues.

Were you able to make the ODI session that you mentioned? If so, would be interesting to hear any notable outcomes…

Read full topic

item.title: IATI and blockchain technology
item.dc:creator: SJohns
item.description:
Also, some useful reading:

James Smith (Open Data Institute Head of Labs): http://theodi.org/blog/data-infrastructure-technology-blockchains

Jenni Tennison (ODI Technical Director and Deputy CEO): Using blockchains outside of crypto-currencies: http://www.jenitennison.com/2015/05/21/blockchain.html

BBC explanation of blockchain tech (video): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2ky3mDUoh74

@siemvaessen’s work in progress - blockchain as a potential solution for disappearing IATI identifiers: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1qxzYSfrChWQPLlOiukqOjAITvSwL7VYFiRW-mrHV08Q/edit

Read full topic
